Elements.Name: IsEnhancedIslandPhysics
Description:
Use physics parameters that allow you to move when drop dashing.
These are identical to the parameters used by "Tighter Drop Dash Rotation" and will not conflict with other physics mods or codes.
Default: True

Elements.Name: IsEnhancedCyberPhysics
Elements.DisplayName: Use Enhanced Physics in Cyber Space
Description:
Use physics parameters that allow you to move when drop dashing.
These are identical to the parameters used by "Tighter Drop Dash Rotation" and will not conflict with other physics mods or codes.
Default: True

Elements.Name: IsDropDashOnSlide
Description: Instantly drop dash on the ground by sliding.

Elements.Name: IsDropDashOnStomp
Description: Instantly drop dash in the air by stomping.

Elements.Name: StompVelocityThreshold
Description:
The velocity Sonic must be at to allow him to drop dash in the air.
Set this to zero to drop dash regardless of velocity.
Default: 25.0

Elements.Name: IsUncurlWhenUngrounded
Description: Automatically uncurl Sonic when he becomes ungrounded, allowing him to perform tricks.

Elements.Name: IsStompAllowedUngroundedUncurl
Description:
Allows Sonic to automatically uncurl when becoming ungrounded when initiating a drop dash by stomping.
This will make stomp act as an immediate trick button.
Default: False

Elements.Name: IsGrindDoubleJumpFix
Description: Allows you to drop dash immediately after jumping off a grind rail, rather than waiting for the separate grind double jump state to exit first.

Elements.Name: IsNoCameraDelay
Description: Disables the drop dash camera delay when entering it normally.

Elements.Name: IsNoSlideCameraDelay
Elements.DisplayName: Disable Drop Dash Camera Delay on Slide
Description: Disables the drop dash camera delay when entering it by sliding.

Elements.Name: IsNoStompCameraDelay
Elements.DisplayName: Disable Drop Dash Camera Delay on Stomp
Description: Disables the drop dash camera delay when entering it by stomping.
